menu.desc: Scoops of chocolate, vanilla, and strawberry ice cream are placed between the banana slices. The ice cream is then covered with chocolate syrup, whipped cream, nuts, and a cherry on top.
Made with hot brownies, vanilla ice cream, chocolate syrup, hot fudge, and whipped cream.
A sweet and slightly tart strawberry sauce is paired with vanilla ice cream and garnished with even more fresh strawberries.
Real Ice Cream blended with sweet OREO Cr√®me and OREO Cookie pieces, topped with even more OREO Cookie pieces.
This Ferrero Rocher milkshake is a creamy shake with the flavours of hazelnut and chocolate. Made with vanilla ice cream, Nutella, and Ferrero Rocher chocolates.
Loaded with brownie chunks and decorated with ganache, this milkshake is packed with delicious chocolate flavour.
Rich and full of flavor, our hot chocolate combines dark chocolate and steamed milk for a warm, sweet treat. Topped with whipped cream and chocolate drizzle.
A shot of espresso combined with steamed milk, chocolate, and topped with a layer of foam, Indulge in the rich and chocolatey flavor.
creamy steamed milk poured over caramel sauce. Topped with whipped cream and caramel sauce.
